TopicTitle: Kerbals what do we call them?

Articles.Content:
Something crossed my mind this morning during breakfast and I did not know how to answer it.

Ok if I am a Human, a man or woman, and we are all mankind or humankind what are Kerbals?

Kerbals, Ker and sheker and Kerbalkind?

Thanks

Kerbalkind was mentioned a couple of times. Especially when landing on a Planet/Moon for the first time

When it comes to Gender I would stick to "male/he" and "female/she" just to keep things simple.

There are no Genders yet, but I already found a Jennie Kerman in the Astronaut Complex.

But I give Jennie only the non-lethal Jobs because I would bet the guys become angry at me when I Crash the only Female around into bedrock.

Edited March 25, 2014 by MalfunctionM1Ke
